net.kuujo.vertigo.hooks

Interface OutputHook

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Hook<OutputCollector>, Serializable

    public interface OutputHook
extends Hook<OutputCollector>
    An output hook. This hook type may be added to any OutputCollector instance either directly via the OutputCollector interface or via a Network definition.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleAcked(MessageId messageId)
      Called when the output receives an ack for an emitted message.
      void handleEmit(MessageId messageId)
      Called when the output emits a message.
      void handleFailed(MessageId messageId)
      Called when the output receives a failure for an emitted message.
      void handleTimeout(MessageId messageId)
      Called when the output receives a timeout for an emitted message.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.kuujo.vertigo.hooks.Hook

        handleStart, handleStop
